h2_title: Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master Boss Fight and Guide
content: If he stabs his sword into the ground in front of him, he's actually hoping to bait you into deflecting your attack, which he'll counter with a charged electric stab. The good news is you can deflect him right back, just be ready for him to get mad and burrow down in response.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Hundred-Eyed_Daoist_Master.md', within the main section titled 'Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master', specifically from the subsection 'Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If he stabs his sword into the ground in front of him, he's actually hoping to bait you into deflecting your attack, which he'll counter with a charged electric stab. The good news is you can deflect him right back, just be ready for him to get mad and burrow down in response.
